short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant access to your prompt library from a side panel, 1-click prompt inserts, shortcuts, and easy backups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1-click prompts for your favorite AI chatbots: All your prompts in a side panel, just click to insert. 

The ✨MagicFridays Prompt List allows you to effortlessly create, store, and insert prompts directly into popular AI chatbots like ChatGPT, Claude.ai, and Microsoft Copilot, making it a must-have for anyone serious about working with generative AI.


-----Key Benefits----

✨ Easy Access from Any Browser Tab:
- Access your stored prompts from any browser tab with a simple side panel, ensuring you have the right prompt at your fingertips whenever you need it.

✨ Effortless Prompt Insertion:
- One click prompt insertion into the AI chat interface from the side panel.
- Use shortcuts to insert prompts at the cursor's position within text fields, saving you time and effort.

✨ Create and Manage Prompts:
- Easily create new prompts with a user-friendly interface.
- Store prompts with unique shortcuts for quick insertion.
- Edit and delete prompts as needed to keep your list up to date.

✨ CSV Import and Export:
- Import prompts from a CSV file, allowing you to bulk upload and manage multiple prompts efficiently.
- Export your prompts to a CSV file, making it easy to back up or share your prompts with others.

✨ Compatible with Popular AI Platforms:
- Works seamlessly with ChatGPT, Claude, Microsoft Copilot, Gemini, Perplexity, & Consensus. And more to come.

✨ User-Friendly Interface:
- Clean and intuitive design for easy navigation and prompt management.

✨ Example Prompts:
- Useful prompt starters are included to give you a head start with the tool.


-----How to Use the Prompt List-----

1. Access the Sidebar
- Click on the extension icon in your browser to open the sidebar.
- From the sidebar, you can create new prompts, manage existing ones, and insert prompts into text fields.

2. Create New Prompts
- Click on the "New Prompt" button in the sidebar.
- Fill in the prompt name, content, and shortcut, then click "Add Prompt" to save.

3. Insert Prompts
- To insert a prompt, simply click on it from the sidebar or type its shortcut in a supported text field and press space.
- The prompt will be inserted at the cursor's position.

4. Import Prompts
- To import click on the "New Prompt" button followed by clicking the "Import prompts from CSV" link
- Download the example CSV to view the correct CSV format
- Click on the "Import prompts from CSV" button and select your CSV file.

5. Export Prompts
- Click on the "Download prompts as CSV" link on the main screen below the Instructions


-----FAQ-----

1. What is the ✨MagicFridays Prompt List?
The Prompt List is a Chrome extension designed to help you manage, store, and insert prompts efficiently. It's ideal for people who frequently need to use predefined text prompts across various platforms.

2. Is the ✨MagicFridays Prompt List free to use?
Yes, it is free to use and there are no premium plans.

3. What platforms are supported?
The Prompt List supports ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, Perplexity, and Consensus. More platforms to be supported shortly.

4. Do I need an account to use the ✨MagicFridays Prompt List?
No, you don't need an account to use this extension. All prompts are stored locally in Chrome Storage, synchronized across your devices for privacy and convenience.


-----Why choose the ✨MagicFridays Prompt List?-----

The Prompt List was designed with user convenience in mind, providing an intuitive interface and powerful features to enhance your productivity. Whether you're a student, parent, or professional, the ✨MagicFridays Prompt List offers the tools you need to work efficiently with your favorite generative AI tools.
